## The system flow

```{=html}
<div class="semantic-system-flow" role="list" aria-label="Semantic Salmon System flow">
  <div class="semantic-system-node" role="listitem">
    <h3>1) DFO Salmon Ontology</h3>
    <p>Use canonical term definitions and IRIs.</p>
    <a href="../ontology/formal-documentation.qmd">Open ontology docs</a>
  </div>
  <div class="semantic-system-arrow" aria-hidden="true">→</div>
  <div class="semantic-system-node" role="listitem">
    <h3>2) SDEP</h3>
    <p>Package dataset metadata in a standard structure.</p>
    <a href="salmon-data-exchange-package.qmd">Open SDEP spec</a>
  </div>
  <div class="semantic-system-arrow" aria-hidden="true">→</div>
  <div class="semantic-system-node" role="listitem">
    <h3>3) metasalmon</h3>
    <p>Run quality and validation checks before intake.</p>
    <a href="../../tools.qmd">Open tools page</a>
  </div>
  <div class="semantic-system-arrow" aria-hidden="true">→</div>
  <div class="semantic-system-node" role="listitem">
    <h3>4) Salmon Data GPT (optional)</h3>
    <p>Draft mappings and package metadata faster.</p>
    <a href="ontology-data-package-gpt.qmd">See intake guidance</a>
  </div>
  <div class="semantic-system-arrow" aria-hidden="true">→</div>
  <div class="semantic-system-node" role="listitem">
    <h3>5) SPSR Intake</h3>
    <p>Upload through the operational FSAR-oriented pathway.</p>
    <a href="https://spsr.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/wizard/1/">Open SPSR upload wizard</a>
  </div>
</div>
```

## What to use this page for

- new contributors who need the shortest correct path
- analysts preparing FSAR datasets for submission
- reviewers checking if a package is intake-ready
